dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: HA! You are NOT going to believe this, Host B.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: H A! You are N O T going to believe this, Host B.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my god, what now? Please tell me it's not another, uh, traffic announcement? Because I swear, the rush hour...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my god, what now? Please tell me it's not another, uh, traffic announcement? Because I swear, the rush hour...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: YES! EXACTLY! It totally IS! Zeinulkabden, you know, the Chairman? From Astana Maslikhat?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Y E S! E X A C T L Y! It totally I S! Zeinulkabden, you know, the Chairman? From Astana Maslikhat?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Chairman of the Astana Maslikhat Tabigat Zeinulkabden announced a soon decision on Astana™s transition to a new work schedule.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Um, yeah, yeah, I know him. He's been hinting at like, work schedule changes, right? For the city?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Um, yeah, yeah, I know him. He's been hinting at like, work schedule changes, right? For the city?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Chairman of the Astana Maslikhat Tabigat Zeinulkabden announced a soon decision on Astana™s transition to a new work schedule.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Precisely! He says a decision is, like, coming SOON. For the new work schedule!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Precisely! He says a decision is, like, coming S O O N. For the new work schedule!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Tabigat Zeinulkabden, it will be made in the near future.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: No way! Really? Oh, thank goodness. Because the morning and evening, like, it's just impossible to move. Impossible! Especially between the left and right banks, right? It's a total, uh, nightmare.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No way! Really? Oh, thank goodness. Because the morning and evening, like, it's just impossible to move. Impossible! Especially between the left and right banks, right? It's a total, uh, nightmare.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the city, during rush hours in the morning and evening, traffic jams form, it is very difficult to move, especially between the left and right banks.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! I mean, finally, someone's doing something! So, what's the plan, like, staggered?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! I mean, finally, someone's doing something! So, what's the plan, like, staggered?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh! Some start earlier, some later. Remember back in, um, 2014, 2015? They did it then!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-huh! Some start earlier, some later. Remember back in, um, twenty fourteen, twenty fifteen? They did it then!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Today, the (next - ed.) work schedule is being considered: someone will start a little earlier, someone a little later. ... Previously, this was practiced, if you remember, in 2014-2015.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh, I totally forgot about that! It, like, actually helped then, didn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh, I totally forgot about that! It, like, actually helped then, didn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: For a bit, yeah! He thinks it won't, uh, take much time this go-around either.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For a bit, yeah! He thinks it won't, uh, take much time this go-around either.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I think it will not take much time," he commented.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, that's actually, like, super smart. And hey, did you see about East Kazakhstan too?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, that's actually, like, super smart. And hey, did you see about East Kazakhstan too?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: What about them? Oh! The "own time" thing? Yeah! All eleven districts, they already switched!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What about them? Oh! The own time thing? Yeah! All eleven districts, they already switched!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: By the way, all 11 districts of the East Kazakhstan region have switched to "their own time."

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: And, um, Shemonaikha and Glubokoe start 8 AM March 13th!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And, um, Shemonaikha and Glubokoe start eight A M March thirteenth!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Starting March 13, employees of government institutions, enterprises, and social services in two districts of East Kazakhstan " Shemonaikha and Glubokoe " will begin work under a new schedule, starting at 8:00 AM.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: That's wild! So it's, like, not just Astana then. This is a whole big thing!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's wild! So it's, like, not just Astana then. This is a whole big thing!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! It's happening. Fingers crossed for, uh, smoother commutes for everyone.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! It's happening. Fingers crossed for, uh, smoother commutes for everyone.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: You and me both, Host B! You and me both.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You and me both, Host B! You and me both.
